Txt_Talk_Baharata_Out_MAIN_0_ACTOR_0210_.Text: *: Gopal, please! You must be calming yourself!
Oh, Tanaya... My most beautiful darling...
*: Oh, brave traveller-jee, I am so, so sorry for all the fuss. I am but a humble seller of black pepper.
*: Please, listen to my tale of awful-awful woe.
*: My most beautiful poti<--->my granddaughter, Tanaya, light of my life<--->is having been kidnapped by despicable scoundrels!
*: The young sahib you see here beside me is her betrothed, Gopal.
*: They were planned to have been being joined together in matrimony, and taking over from me my shop.
*: You seem to me very strong and tough. Please, you must rescue my Tanaya-jaan!
Oof, no, uncle! I must be the one who saves her myself!
Besides, we cannot put our troubles upon this unknown traveller!
Please, to be waiting here. Tanaya! Darling! I am coming to save you!
*: Accha, if Gopal is being captured also, then whatever am I to do...?
*: Accha, if Gopal is being captured also, then whatever am I to do...?

Txt_Talk_Baharata_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0310_0.Text: *: Namaste! Welcome to the town of Baharata, traveller-jee!

Txt_Talk_Baharata_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0410_0.Text: *: Ahh, it is for these most sacred waters that I have journeyed so far!
*: The waters of this, our most hallowed river, are quenching not only the thirst, but warding off evil spirits, also!

Txt_Talk_Baharata_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0510_0.Text: *: I am regularly purifying myself in the holy and most sacred river that runs here through the town.
*: I am hoping that it will bring to me the bouncing baby child I have longed for since so long ago.

Txt_Talk_Baharata_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0610_0.Text: *: Traveller-jee...you are encountering plenty of danger on your wanderings, yes? Then listen to me most carefully... The somatic staff is being a most wondrous-wondrous wand that allows magical power to be used offensively.
*: This is burning up much magical energy, but can prove most useful indeed when magic is sealed or forbidden...
*: Accha, I am becoming so frustrated of late with my most unreservedly straight-laced personality...
*: If only I were able to become a most funny and hilarious clown...
*: I am being so jealous of you! You are having the soul of a clown, yes? Yes, this I am seeing right away...
*: You are very lucky to be having a friend who is in their heart a clown, traveller-jee!

Txt_Talk_Baharata_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0710_0.Text: *: The Archfiend is sure to destroy us all.
*: He is master of the cold and freezing darkness! Lord and king of the land of death!
*: Soon, all shall shudder and shake in the shadow of his wicked-wicked designs!

Txt_Talk_Baharata_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0810_0.Text: *: Black pepper, you say? The uncle who is running the shop down the way is selling just such spices. Now, to business! Ahem!

Txt_Talk_Baharata_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_1010_0.Text: *: The woman next to me, with her splishing and splashing, is driving me crazy!
*: There will be no holy river left by the time she's done, let me tell you!

Txt_Talk_Baharata_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_1110_0.Text: *: Hm hm hm! I shall be young and beautiful once more! Ahh, a splash here, and a dab there!
*: Well, it would be awfully remiss of one not to make the most of these miraculous waters, having come all this way! Hm hm!

Txt_Talk_Baharata_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_1220_0.Text: *: The waters of this sacred torrent do render the vocal chords pliant and magnificently resonant. ♪ Fa-la-la-laaa! ♪
*: But tell no one of this! It is a closely guarded secret of the bardic trade!

Txt_Talk_Baharata_Out_SUB_0_VOLUME_1310_.Text: {LEADER} calms the monster with a soothing voice and tells it about Monty's monster menagerie...

Txt_Talk_Baharata_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_1410_0.Text: *: I have never met a mage or priest that was not being delighted when they were furnished with <IndefSgl_I_NAME>.

Txt_Talk_Baharata_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_1510_0.Text: *: Are you hearing of <DefSgl_I_NAME>? It is allowing even magic users to exercise their brawn in battles by beating up the enemy.
*: It is far from cheap, but I am still finding myself most tempted to buy one.

Txt_Talk_Baharata_Church_SUB_0_ACTOR_022.Text: *: Darkness... Bleakness... Despair... How long now since this became all that my seeings foretold?
*: Even an old heretic such as myself begins to wonder if she might not turn to the Goddess for solace...

Txt_Talk_Baharata_House1_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_.Text: *: You don't wanna go in the cave beyond them bridges near town<--->it's a den of 'andsome yet bloodthirsty kidnappers!
*: ...Eh? 'Ow do I know? I just do, alright? Now, if you know what's good for ya, you'll steer clear!
*: Well, that's what the rumours say, but you don't wanna go believin' everythin' you 'ear, mate...
*: Some bloke I met done a bit of explorin' round the Cape o' Theddon. Said 'e found some ruined village.
*: If 'e ain't lyin'<--->an' I ain't sayin' 'e ain't<--->it'll be the Archfiend done the ruinin', you mark my words.
*: Is it truly true, friend? The Archfiend is soon to destroy us all?
*: You are being in possession of a boat, I believe, traveller-jee. Impressive. Most impressive indeed.
*: Treasure of great value must surely lie in wait across the seas.
*: If it were not for the foul monsters that infest our world, I would go in search of riches and fortune my own self...

Txt_Talk_Baharata_Inn_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_011.Text: *: It is said that beyond the mountains north-east of here is standing Alltrades Abbey, a place where vocations may be freely changed.
*: Are you aware that beyond the mountains north-east of here stands Alltrades Abbey, a place where vocations may be freely changed?
*: Perhaps I will try the life of a gadabout<---> No. A wise and most sagacious sage. Arey, that would be most agreeable!
*: Accha, it is not there, you say? But this is most strange indeed...

Txt_Talk_Baharata_Inn_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_022.Text: *: The hallowed waters of the great river are the source of all life.

Txt_Talk_Baharata_Inn_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_032.Text: *: Tomorrow, I will again be purifying myself in the holy and most sacred river.

Txt_Talk_Baharata_Inn_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_042.Text: *: Forgive my rudeness, but the lady in the next room can only be described as a thug. There! I have said it.
*: Oof! Your companion, too, is one!?

Txt_Talk_Baharata_Inn_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_052.Text: *: Ah-phew... Ah-phew... Hm hm hm! Ah-phew...

Txt_Talk_Baharata_Shop3_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0.Text: *: I came here to this place to buy black pepper.
*: But the uncle who is running the shop is having had his granddaughter kidnapped. Accha, such an inconvenience...
*: Thanks to you, I have been able to buy black pepper at last! You have my great thanks, traveller-jee!

Txt_Talk_Baharata_Shop3_1F_MAIN_0_ACTOR_.Text: Namaste, and welcome to the emporium of spices!
Arey, but it is you, saviour-jee!
It is I, Gopal Gupta! I am still most thoroughly in your debt for all that you have done.
Are you here in search of black pepper, perhaps?
I must be thanking you for rescuing my most precious-precious Tanaya!
If ever you should find yourself in the local area again, please do show me your face. Travel safely, saviour-jee.
Then allow me to get you some right away!
Arey... I am most sorry for this, but we have no black pepper.
However, do not look so glum!
There is a trader we do business with who always has some to hand.
You should be able to find him in Alltrades Abbey to the north. Tell him Gopal sent you.
Oh, saviour-jee, please! I could not be taking any reward from you for this. The fact you have saved my best beloved is more than enough.
Now, it will take a little while to reach Alltrades Abbey. First, cross the bridge close to Baharata, before making your way north towards the mountains. Eventually, the abbey will come into view.
Best of luck, and thank you for everything you have done, saviour-jee!
Namaste, and welcome to the emporium of spices!
Travel safely now, saviour-jee. And come to visit us again soon!

Txt_Talk_Baharata_Shop3_2F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0.Text: *: Traveller-jee! Friend! I am having heard everything that occurred!
*: You have my deepest, unreserved and most undying gratitude! That I am able to rest at last is thanks to you and you alone!
*: Gopal and Tanaya are running the shop in a most satisfactory manner.
*: Now all that I require to be truly happy is a great-grandchild!
*: Zzz... Hm hm... Say hello to your paradaadaa, baby-jaan! Mwah! Zzz...
Arey, brave, brave hero! It is you! Thank you so very, very, very much for coming to my aid!
Thanks to you, I have returned to my home, and Gopal and I have inherited my dear daadaa's shop!
Accha, welcome, welcome, saviour-jee! Thanks to you, business is booming!
Saviour-jee, are you ever having visited Alltrades Abbey to the north-east?
Gopal, my most dearly beloved beloved, once went there to try and become a warrior<--->all so that he could be saving me!
Sadly, though, he was not successful, but I still cherish him just as much!

Txt_Talk_Baharata_Out_SearchObj_River_1.Text: The waters of the sacred river flow swiftly by. Bathe in them?

Txt_Talk_Baharata_Out_SearchObj_River_2.Text: {LEADER} takes a quick dip in the river, and is filled with an overwhelming sensation of calm and purity...
